basic.description: Introduction to computer networks. Layered network architecture, the physical (PHY) layer, link layer, medium access control (MAC), network layer, routing, quality-of service (QoS), security, Internet applications.  Wireless local area networks (LANs), metropolitan area networks (MANs), ad hoc networks, and cellular networks. IEEE 802 standards. Future of computer communications. Three term-hours, lectures. C.H. Yeh.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Computer Communications
